short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Yuji Itadori in a dynamic scene with shifting RGB colors creating a vibrant backdrop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the world of Yuji Itadori with a vibrant, dynamic theme!

🎨 Minimalist Design: Showcasing Yuji Itadori seated confidently against a background of shifting RGB colors, symbolizing his energy and the chaos of curses.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on top of your schedule with a stylish display that complements the colorful theme.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly reach your favorite websites with the agility of a Jujutsu sorcerer.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy mini-games inspired by Jujutsu Kaisen and Yuji’s thrilling battles.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Boost your browsing experience with features as dynamic and adaptable as Yuji himself.
